questions.question: Under fluidized condition, pressure drop across the bed ____________ with the superficial velocity?
For calculation of particle Reynolds number ___________________________ is the characteristic dimension used?
Minimum fluidization velocity for a fluidized bed system depends on

answers.a: size, shape and density of particles alone
answers.c: Both size,shape and density of particles alone and density and viscosity of fluid

questions.question: The height of a fluidized bed at incipient fluidization is 0.075 m, and the corresponding voidage is 0.38. If the voidage of the bed increases to 0.5, then the height of the bed would be

A 1m high bed made up of 2mm particles is to be fluidised by an oil (density 900 kg/m3; viscosity 0.01 Pa s).  If at the point of incipient fluidisation, the bed voidage is 39% and the pressure drop across the bed is 10 kPa, then the density of particles is
